items.name: Advanced Iron Lure
items.description: The Advanced Iron Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Advanced Iron Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Aluminium Ingot
items.description: Aluminium Ingot is the refined resource crafted fromAluminium Ore.

items.name: Cold Steel Bolt
items.description: The Cold Steel Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. In addition to projectile damage, it has a chance to inflict a Freeze modifier that slows and damages enemies.

items.name: Cold Steel Ingot
items.description: Cold Steel Ingots are a refined resource crafted fromSteel IngotsandSuper Cooled Ice. Prospectors must use aConcrete Furnaceor anElectric Furnaceto refine the resources listed below into a Cold Steel Ingot.

items.name: Cold Steel Javelin
items.description:
The Cold Steel Javelin is a variant of theCold Steel Spearthat can only be thrown. Deals frost damage on hit and has a 15% chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while dealing periodic frost damage. Excels when used against Fauna that have a weakness to frost. A list of Fauna that are weak to frost can be viewedhere. When the Freeze modifier does proc, periodic frost damage is dealt to the target over the span of 10 seconds.
Fauna with:

items.name: Cold Steel Sickle
items.description: Cold Steel Sickle is aTier 3Sicklemade withCold Steel Ingotsintroduced onPrometheus. Due to the materials required, crafting the item requires the New Frontiers DLC.

items.name: Copper Attachment
items.description: Copper Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

items.name: Copper Bolt
items.description: The Copper Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Copper Cluster Lamp
items.description: The Copper Cluster Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

items.name: Copper Geode Lamp
items.description: The Copper Geode Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

items.name: Copper Ingot
items.description: Copper Ingot is the refined resource crafted fromCopper Ore.

items.name: Copper Monolith Lamp
items.description: The Copper Monolith Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

items.name: Copper Nail
items.description: Copper Nail are used widely in crafting of items such as interiorInterior Wood Building Pieces, and other items made ofRefined Woodat theCarpentry BenchandMachining Bench.

items.name: Copper Wire
items.description: Copper Wire is used in a variety of high-end buildings and components and is crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Deluxe Leather Saddle
items.description: The Deluxe Leather Saddle is a saddle forMountsmade with cured leather. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to theBasic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

items.name: Iron Bolt
items.description: The Iron Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Iron Crop Plot
items.description: The Iron Crop Plot is a farming plot for growingSeedsthat can later be harvested forPlant Resourcesonce fully grown. Unless the Prospector has theFresh Is Besttalent when deploying a seed into the crop plot, the grownPlant Resourcewill eventually wither if not harvested.

items.name: Iron Cupboard
items.description: The Iron Cupboard comes with 50 inventory slots and can be used to safely store valuable resources. Unlike theWood Cupboard, it does not require shelter and can be placed outside without risk of taking damage during storms.

items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description: Iron Ingot is the refined resource crafted fromIron Oreand is one of the most used materials in theTier 2Tech Tree and beyond.

items.name: Iron Javelin
items.description: The Iron Javelin is a variant of theIron Spearthat can only be thrown and is an upgrade over the Tier 1 Javelins.

items.name: Iron Lure
items.description: The Iron Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like allLures, the Iron Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Iron Nail
items.description: Iron Nail are used widely in crafting of items such asStone Building Pieces, andIron Tools.

items.name: Iron Shears
items.description: The Iron Shears are use to shearSheepto obtainWool. Can cause 30-40 Melee damage

items.name: Iron Sickle
items.description: Used by 'attacking' plants such as shrubs,Reed Flower,Wheat, etc. Sickles significantly increase the yield of plants when harvesting.

items.name: Leather
items.description: Leather is a crucial component of many recipes in Icarus. Having a good stockpile of leather is something every prospector strive for.

items.name: Leather Attachment
items.description: Leather Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

items.name: Leather Backpack
items.description: The Leather Backpack is a must need when mining ores, or taking long trips across Icarus, fit everything you need inside for survival!

items.name: Medium Iron Crate
items.description: A Medium Iron Crate, use it to safely store valuable resources. Unlike theMedium Wood Crate, it does not require shelter and can be placed outside (immune to storm damage).

items.name: Platinum Ingot
items.description: Platinum Ingot is the refined resource crafted fromPlatinum Ore.

items.name: Refined Gold
items.description: Refined Gold is the refined resource crafted fromGold Ore.

items.name: Refined Wood
items.description: Refined Wood is used for the construction ofInterior Wood Buildings, Refined Wood Deployables, and various Tools.

items.name: Refined Wood Lure
items.description: The Refined Wood Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Refined Wood Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Rope
items.description: Intermediate crafting item used as a component of many recipes.

items.name: Small Iron Crate
items.description: A Small Iron Crate, use it to safely store valuable resources. Unlike theSmall Wood Crate, it does not require shelter and can be placed outside (immune to storm damage).

items.name: Steel Bloom
items.description: Steel Bloom is a crafted resource that can be smelted in aStone Furnace,Concrete FurnaceorElectric Furnaceto make aSteel Ingot. It can made made fromIron OreorIron IngotandCoal OreorCharcoal.

items.name: Steel Bolt
items.description: The Steel Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Steel Heater Shield
items.description: Background information on the Steel Heater Shield can be foundhere.

items.name: Steel Ingot
items.description: Steel Ingot is the refined resource crafted fromSteel Bloom, prospectors may use aStone Furnace,Concrete Furnace, orElectric Furnace.

items.name: Steel Javelin
items.description: The Steel Javelin is a variant of theSteel Spearthat can only be thrown. A cheap upgrade to theIron Javelinthat increases projectile damage with a lower break chance, but is locked until prospectors reach level 20.

items.name: Steel Rebar
items.description: Steel Rebar is a critical component ofConcrete Structures, and is solely used for this purpose.

items.name: Steel Screw
items.description: Steel Screw is used in crafting high end tools, weapons, and structures likeAluminium Buildings.

items.name: Titanium Ingot
items.description: Titanium Ingot is the refined resource crafted fromTitanium Ore, is used widely inTier 4crafting recipes.
